mapper.insert: insert into mst_board_tb ( board_gp, board_no, user_id, create_dt, board_readcount, board_title, board_content ) values ( '1', mst_board_tb_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, sysdate, #{board_readcount}, #{board_title}, #{board_content} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from mst_board_tb where board_gp = 1
